Package by.epamtc.zarutski.dao.connection

Class ConnectionPool

java.lang.Object
by.epamtc.zarutski.dao.connection.ConnectionPool
public final class ConnectionPool
extends java.lang.Object
The class ConnectionPool provides an implementation to manage access to the Connection objects
Author:
Maksim Zarutski
See Also:
DBResourceManager, DBParameter
